synopsis.text: Sonsaku's sister, Chuubou Sonken, awakens her inner dragon as Himiko, the reincarnated queen of Yamatai, wages war against the magatama wielders of Kanto in search of Japan's true Three Sacred Treasures. As the battle for power in the Kanto region subsides, a new threat emerges as Himiko's ally, Asaemon Yamada, attacks Nanyou Academy in pursuit of a sacred sword. In order to protect her sister and recover her own magatama, Sonsaku must journey to the legendary Jofuku Temple, where she will undergo training that may cost her her life. As the boundaries between the living and the dead begin to blur, the warriors of Kanto must unite to stop Himiko's mysterious plans and prevent the end of the power struggle from turning into a full-blown war. The fate of the region rests in the hands of these high school fighters, each imbued with the essence of ancient Chinese soldiers from the Three Kingdoms. Will they be able to stop Himiko and restore peace to Kanto? Find out in Shin Ikkitousen, the thrilling sequel to the Ikkitousen series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
